1.content:
Charis Goldman, 46, was a woman who has worked in the pornography industry for over 2 decades and still one of the most talked-about women in the business. But she wanted to do more - be a little more innovative. So she decided to get pregnant and see where things went from there.

Instead of having sex, like one would think for someone in such an industry, Charis decided to get IVF treatment. There, she'd get implanted with 6 embryos, in hopes of one of them attaching to her uterus. Miraculously enough, she was confirmed pregnant after her first meeting!
1.title: Her First - And Last - Time

info.brief_description: It's never too late to become a mother...
info.description: Charis Goldman, 46, was a woman who has worked in the pornography industry for over 2 decades and still one of the most talked-about women in the business. But she wanted to do more - be a little more innovative. So she decided to get pregnant and see where things went from there.
